entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,677Chapters: 11/15Kudos: 110

Summary: Felix never expected his job to lead him here: standing in his boss‚Äôs living room, heart pounding as Chris steps closer, voice low and controlled, asking him to name the boundaries he doesn‚Äôt want crossed. Their arrangement was supposed to be professional. Structured. Safe. But the air between them is tight with something neither is ready to acknowledge. When Chris invites Felix to a high-stakes company dinner as his plus one‚Äîwith the promise of subtle touches, whispered cues, and a rival CEO known for showing off‚ÄîFelix realizes this is no longer just practice. Each session pushes them further, blurring professionalism with want, caution with craving. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.

entry.title: Pretty When You Lie
entry.summary:
Author: Binbin_bean

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,446Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Chan owns a cozy little caf√© called ‚ÄúHome Brew.‚Äù It‚Äôs the kind of place where people overshare their lives between sips of coffee. Everyone adores Chan ‚Äî kind, soft-spoken, always remembering customers‚Äô orders ‚Äî but Minho sees something off.Because Minho isn‚Äôt there for coffee.He‚Äôs there undercover.There have been a series of slow, subtle poisonings in the area, all linked to drinks or pastries from that same caf√© ‚Äî though no proof has ever surfaced. Minho, a detective who prides himself on reading people, is assigned to investigate.Except‚Ä¶ Chan doesn‚Äôt act like a killer. He‚Äôs warm. He‚Äôs lonely. And when he looks at Minho, there‚Äôs recognition. Something quiet and dangerous.As Minho gets closer, the story teeters between affection and suspicion ‚Äî are the smiles real, or bait? And when the final cup is poured, Minho realizes he‚Äôs in too deep: in love, or in danger ‚Äî maybe both.Or: A detective walks into a caf√© to catch a killer.He ends up falling for the man who might be one.

entry.title: chanihae? chanihae!
entry.summary:
Author: catnip4lino

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,755Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 140

Summary: Minho is most likely to slip up during comeback preparations, or immediately after it during promotions. It's because they can't give each other as much attention as they'd like to. Schedules are packed with recording sessions, dance practices, interviews, dress rehearsals, music videos shoots, the whole song and dance that comes with making a comeback. Even in the small windows of downtime they have, they're much too tired to play. What they do have is falling on top of each other exhausted, passing out as soon as their heads hit the pillow or the other's chest. Chan's hand in Minho's hair, Minho's face in his neck, their legs entangled under the warm sanctuary of their beds. When they wake up, it's short bursts of kisses or hurried make out sessions before they're getting whisked away by their managers into separate cars. It isn't nearly enough, not with how intensely they both get into their roles. ¬† or the one where Minho starts to fall into his headspace on schedule‚Äî Only a little bit! Luckily for Chan, he‚Äôs the bestest boy in the world.
